content:
assistant> Hello! I’m your AI guide for building a doodle caption. I’m designed to ask you questions and guide your reasoning but if you want to take control of your own creative process, I’ll be happy to help wherever possible.
user> Hello!!

Using a grounding style is beneficial in this conversation because it emphasizes the connection between the story elements and the droodle, ensuring that the eventual caption emerges organically from the visual context. This method encourages participants to think critically about how their narrative ideas translate into the image, ultimately leading to a more creative and cohesive droodle caption.
